t: Why does the Amazon app use WebView in their Android and iOS application? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): There are several reasons for this. 1. Since, few layouts and assets are used to build the app, its build size is small. 2. Its easier to add or remove features without pushing any new updates. 3. They don’t need to create a seperate mobile website.
